> Oh, and DPH - I ran it over that 200k scenario file in your torture 
pack,
> and it only took a second or two to load (P3-800), we'll see how 
long it
> takes to write it back out :)

Wow.  I think that scenario takes about 10 seconds or so to load on my 
PC.  Almost every object (all but one player 1 position, a few magic 
potions, and a few faeries) is gold.  Building that scenario took a 
lot of time.  On the other hand, the purpose of that scenario was to 
save me time creating super-powered characters for testing.
